items.todoItem: Know that God the Father raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that grace and peace come from God the Father and from our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that Jesus gave Himself for our sins.
Know that Jesus gave Himself to deliver us from this evil world.
Know that the sacrifice of Jesus for our salvation was the will of God our Father.
Know that God wants to deliver us from this present evil world.
Know that God is our Father.
Give glory to God our Father for ever and ever.
Know that you are called into the grace of Christ.
Do not allow false teachers to lure you away from the grace of Christ by false doctrine.
Beware those that trouble you and seek to pervert the gospel of Christ.
Seek to please God, not men.
Do not seek to please men.
Know that the servant of Christ must not seek to please men.
Know that the gospel we preach is not human in origin but divine.
Know that we are taught by Jesus when we enter into relationship with God.
Allow God to reveal His Son in you.
Give others cause to glorify God in you.
